thing.name: Table and 4 Chairs
thing.text:
A table with 4 chairs (only 2 seen in the pictures).
Table can be opened and extended (extensions stored under it).
Dimensions (without extension): Width 100cm, Height 74cm, Length 182cm

thing.name: Home Bundle (Blankets, Pillows, etc...)
thing.text:
"Welcome to Oxford" Home Bundle:
- The main part of the bundle is not in the pictures: Double wool duvet, Double summer blanket, Double duvet (very warm), Double duvet (medium-warmth), 2 excellent Single duvets, Single light duvet, 5 excellent pillows, 4 simple pillows, 3 bath mats.

- 1st picture: Bundle of sheets (mostly double, some single), and towels. (There are more not in the picture).
- 2nd picture: Laundry hamper and 2 vases.
- 3rd picture: Mirror
- 4th picture: Laundry basket
- 5th picture: Laundry rack.

thing.name: Mothercare Cot Bed with Mothercare Mattress
thing.text:
A Mothercare cot bed with a Mothercare mattress.
Dimensions: 61cm x 162cm, for standard 60x120 mattress.
We bought the mattress brand new, and used it for 1.5 years.
The cot bed is used, and the back panel has to be secured with zip ties. Other than that the cot bed is fine.
Can be dissembled and collected easily
Preferred collection after 16.5.2019.

thing.name: Baby Bath
thing.text: A baby bath with non-slip strips.

thing.name: Baby Swivel Bathseat
thing.text: A swivelling bath seat, with suction cups for attaching to bath floor.

thing.name: Mamas and Papas Armadillo Pram
thing.text:
An "Armadillo" pushchair by Mamas and Papas.
Very light, folds easily (single handed), reclines to any angle between sitting and sleeping position.
"Lie-flat seat" suitable from birth
Comes with original rain cover, and in original its box.
Link to the model in Mamas and Papas

thing.name: RedKite Baby Carrier + Japanese Baby Sling
thing.text:
- RedKite baby carrier in original box, with instructions.
- A Japanese baby sling (never used). Very light. Comes with instructions on paper and on DVD.

thing.name: Hand Blender and Chopper
thing.text: Breville hand blender and chopper. In original box.
